[{"parentKey":"ROOT","key":"HEADER","leaf":false,"componentType":"Label","top":"10","left":"10","width":"200","height":"20"},{"parentKey":"ROOT","key":"TITLE","leaf":false,"componentType":"Label","top":"40","left":"10","width":"200","height":"20"},{"parentKey":"ROOT","key":"VALUE","leaf":false,"componentType":"Label","top":"60","left":"-1","right":"10","width":"200","height":"40"},{"parentKey":"ROOT","key":"CHART","leaf":false,"specification":"<MicroAreaChart minXValue='0' maxXValue='100' minYValue='0' maxYValue='100' class='marginTopLeft' press='press'>
 <firstXLabel>
 <MicroAreaChartLabel label='June 1' color='Good'/>
 </firstXLabel>
 <lastXLabel>
 <MicroAreaChartLabel label='June 30' color='Critical'/>
 </lastXLabel>
 <firstYLabel>
 <MicroAreaChartLabel label='0M' color='Good'/>
 </firstYLabel>
 <lastYLabel>
 <MicroAreaChartLabel label='80M' color='Critical'/>
 </lastYLabel>
 <chart>
 <MicroAreaChartItem>
 <points>
 <MicroAreaChartPoint x='0' y='0' />
 <MicroAreaChartPoint x='30' y='20' />
 <MicroAreaChartPoint x='60' y='20' />
 <MicroAreaChartPoint x='100' y='80' />
 </points>
 </MicroAreaChartItem>
 </chart>
 <target>
 <MicroAreaChartItem>
 <points>
 <MicroAreaChartPoint x='0' y='0' />
 <MicroAreaChartPoint x='30' y='30' />
 <MicroAreaChartPoint x='60' y='40' />
 <MicroAreaChartPoint x='100' y='90' />
 </points>
 </MicroAreaChartItem>
 </target>

 <minThreshold>
 <MicroAreaChartItem color='Error'>
 <points>
 <MicroAreaChartPoint x='0' y='0' />
 <MicroAreaChartPoint x='30' y='20' />
 <MicroAreaChartPoint x='60' y='30' />
 <MicroAreaChartPoint x='100' y='70' />
 </points>
 </MicroAreaChartItem>
 </minThreshold>
 </MicroAreaChart>","componentType":"MicroAreaChart","bottom":"40","top":"-1","left":"10","right":"10","width":"auto","height":"80"},{"parentKey":"ROOT","key":"FOOTER","leaf":false,"componentType":"Label","top":"-1","bottom":"10"},{"parentKey":"HEADER","key":"HEADER/text","leaf":true,"value":"Header"},{"parentKey":"HEADER","key":"HEADER/styleClass","leaf":true,"value":"scn-pack-KpiTile-Header"},{"parentKey":"TITLE","key":"TITLE/text","leaf":true,"value":"Title"},{"parentKey":"TITLE","key":"TITLE/styleClass","leaf":true,"value":"scn-pack-KpiTile-Title"},{"parentKey":"VALUE","key":"VALUE/text","leaf":true,"value":"Value"},{"parentKey":"VALUE","key":"VALUE/styleClass","leaf":true,"value":"scn-pack-KpiTile-Value"},{"parentKey":"VALUE","key":"VALUE/textAlign","leaf":true,"value":"sap.ui.core.TextAlign.Right"},{"parentKey":"FOOTER","key":"FOOTER/text","leaf":true,"value":"Footer"}]

property.title: Fallback Picture Url
property.tooltip: Url for Fallback Picture (must be set)

property.tooltip: Link text to be displayed..

property.title: On Press
property.tooltip: Fires the event when the user clicks the control.

Technical property for list of nodes
Url for Default Image
property.tooltip: Url for Default Image which should be shown

property.title: Text Value
property.tooltip: Button text displayed at runtime

property.title: Tooltip Value
property.tooltip: Button tooltip displayed at runtime

property.title: Enabled
property.tooltip: Switches enabled state of the control. Disabled fields have different colors and can not be focused.

property.title: Icon
property.tooltip: Icon to be displayed as graphical element within the button. This can be an URI to an image or an icon font URI

property.title: Technical proprty for Clean All Nodes
Technical property for list of nodes
Url for Default Image
property.tooltip: Url for Default Image which should be shown

property.title: Technical property for Clean All Nodes
Technical property for list of nodes
Default Image - Needed for Calculation of the Url Prefix for Repository
Notifications
property.tooltip: The Notifications Pushed to Client

property.title: Categories
property.tooltip: The Notifications Pushed to Client

property.title: Connect To Common Messages
property.tooltip: Setting this to TRUE also the common Messages from messages popup will be handover to this notification bar

property.title: Split Notifications by Priority
property.tooltip: Setting this to TRUE the Notifications will be displayed in categories by priority

property.title: Show Notification Bar when New Notifications are Available
property.tooltip: Setting this to TRUE shows always Notification Bar when new Notifications are Available

property.title: Delete Notification when Clicked
property.tooltip: Setting this to TRUE deletes the Notification on click event

property.title: Remove All Notifications when Minimized
property.tooltip: Setting this to TRUE deletes all Notifications on minimize event

property.title: Technical property for list of nodes
Url for Default Image
property.tooltip: Url for Default Image which should be shown

property.title: Current Page
property.tooltip: Represents the current page number.

property.title: Number of Pages
property.tooltip: Represents the overall number of pages that are embedded into the parent control.

property.title: On Page Change
property.tooltip: Event is fired when the user navigates to another page by selecting it directly, or by jumping forward or backward.

property.title: Bar Color
property.tooltip: The color of the bar.

property.title: Display Value
property.tooltip: The text value to be displayed in the bar.

property.title: Enabled
property.tooltip: Switches enabled state of the control. Disabled fields have different colors and can not be focused.

property.title: Percent Value
property.tooltip: The numerical value for the displayed length of the progress bar.

property.title: Show Value
property.tooltip: Specifies whether the current value shall be rendered inside the bar.

property.title: Editable
property.tooltip: Value 'true' is required for changes on the rating symbols.

property.title: Icon Hovered
property.tooltip: The URI to the image which is displayed when the mouse hovers onto a rating symbol. If used, a requirement is that all custom icons need to have the same size. Note that when this attribute is used also the other icon attributes need to be set.

property.title: Icon Selected
property.tooltip: The URI to the image which shall be displayed for all selected rating symbols. Note that when this attribute is used, also the other icon attributes need to be set.

property.title: Icon Unselected
property.tooltip: The URI to the image which shall be displayed for all unselected rating symbols. If this attribute is used, a requirement is that all custom icons need to have the same size. Note that when this attribute is used also the other icon attributes need to be set.

property.title: Maximum Value
property.tooltip: The number of displayed rating symbols

property.title: Value
property.tooltip: The number of displayed rating symbols

property.title: On Change
property.tooltip: The event is fired when the user has done a rating.

property.title: Technical Property For Pressed Button Key
Technical Property For Pressed Item Key
Text Value
property.tooltip: The text content of this text area

property.title: Maximal Length
property.tooltip: Teh Maximal Length in Characters

property.title: Text Value
property.tooltip: Button text displayed at runtime

property.title: Tooltip Value
property.tooltip: Button tooltip displayed at runtime

property.title: Enabled
property.tooltip: Switches enabled state of the control. Disabled fields have different colors and can not be focused.

property.title: Icon
property.tooltip: Icon to be displayed as graphical element within the button. This can be an URI to an image or an icon font URI

property.title: Icon Hovered
property.tooltip: Icon to be displayed as graphical element within the button when it is hovered (only if also a base icon was specified). If not specified the base icon is used. If a icon font icon is used, this property is ignored

property.title: Icon Selected
property.tooltip: Icon to be displayed as graphical element within the button when it is selected (only if also a base icon was specified). If not specified the base or hovered icon is used. If a icon font icon is used, this property is ignored

property.title: Pressed
property.tooltip: The property is true when the control is toggled. The default state of this property is false

property.title: Valid State (for custom)
property.tooltip: Valid State, only for custom validation

property.title: Validation Type
property.tooltip: Predefined Typs of Input Validation

property.title: Length
property.tooltip: Length (required for length validation)

property.title: Number
property.tooltip: Number (required for than validation)

property.title: Default Value
property.tooltip: Default Value (required for default validation)

property.title: Event for On Value Help Request
